subtitle: Hello everyone. I wanted to just send a message out to all our players around the world, because, today is a very special day for Blizzard Entertainment. The company turns twenty years old which is absolutely incredible. When we first started the company back in 1991, there were just three of us, and we really just wanted to use this opportunity to thank you for all these years of support, because without you, we wouldn't be able to continue doing what we do.
subtitle_en: Hello everyone. I wanted to just send a message out to all our players around the world, because, today is a very special day for Blizzard Entertainment. The company turns twenty years old which is absolutely incredible. When we first started the company back in 1991, there were just three of us, and we really just wanted to use this opportunity to thank you for all these years of support, because without you, we wouldn't be able to continue doing what we do.
